channel.title: PI Slayer Shop
channel.description:
Hey,
The slayer master works, I have edited in my npc3.py so it should open the shop but it doesn't!?
[code=java]from server.util import ScriptManager
def npcClick_3_8275(c, npcId): c.getShops().openShop(48)
[/code]
Any suggestions what I might have missed etc?

item.title: PI Slayer Shop
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

the python scripting in PI is commented out.

Read full topic

item.title: PI Slayer Shop
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

Use actionhandler.java src/server/model/players search third until you find thirdclicknpc. Or somethign and make a new case.

case npcId:
shopcode
break;

Read full topic

item.title: PI Slayer Shop
item.dc:creator: @UniqueTrys UniqueTrys
item.description:
@UniqueTrys wrote:

[quote=“xXxSkillerxXx, post:2, topic:409122”]what is your npc for the npc shop? if you dont have one of these try them:
Durdel
Annak
Slayer Master
Registone
PEKACHU jkjk[/quote]

Pekachu might work xD. But I have duradel already and the shop just doesn’t pop up. I think I have to like add it in another file too but I wouldn’t know where to add it.

Read full topic
